welcome_message_body: Welcome to Esteban Echeverria, Argentina! Known for its rich history, charming architecture, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal for both international and domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport. Users must accept terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Terminal A

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights within Argentina.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
